Posts.Title: Anyone having surgery in April?? ottawagirl wahine

Posts.Content: susieloutoo wrote: Hi all - I had a SNB in April this year and it came out clear. I had a Bilateral Mastectomy 10 days ago and they found 2/8 nodes with Breast cancer. Anyone every hear of this???I am triple negative andÂ I am scared. Thank you Susieloutoo Dx 4/11/2007, IDC, 5cm, Stage II, Grade 3, 2/8 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Oct 29, 2007 09:20PM susieloutoo wrote: Hi Bessie - Thanks for your post. They only took one node in April. I did not have any surgery to remove tissue in April - they did chemo first to shrink 4 cm tumor. So first surgery was October and they decided to look at more nodes then. Thanks so much Susieloutoo
